name: PROJECT:SOLACE (itch)
description:
PROJECT:SOLACE

A 2D sidescroller with RPG, platformer elements, and permadeath! Currently in development.

Story

You arrive on an island as Sophie. She and six other individuals have opted to join a competition surivial show with a monetary grand prize.   However, quickly things begin to unfold and show things are not what they seem. Now Sophie and the other contestants must fight to survive and escape the island!
